comments: Just brainstorming ways to possibly represent rules data in a parsing tool

Bodywork.prompt: Is your car body mostly stock and does it meet the requirements below?
Bodywork.body: Rule: See section 13.1 of the rules for clarification, but unless modifications are explicitly permitted, they are not allowed. Things that are allowed:...etc

Tires.prompt: Are your tires 200 treadwear and DOT legal?
